#include <iostream>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
int testcases;
int number;

cin >> testcases;
    for(int x = 0; x < testcases; x++)
        {

            cin >> number;

            for(int y = number; y > 0; y--)
            {
                int start = number*2 - (y*y) + y;
                if(start % (y*2) == 0 && start > 0)
                {
                    start = start / (y*2);
                    for(int z = 0; z < y; z++)
                    {
                        cout << start + z << " ";
                    }

                cout << endl;
                break;
                }
            }
        }
    return 0;
}
